name: Bruce FERRELL, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Secretary of Department of Corrections, Appellees

parties: Bruce FERRELL, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Secretary of Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 24th day of May, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
805 A.2d 1210
Bruce FERRELL, Appellant, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Secretary of Department of Corrections, Appellees.
No. 53 MAP 2002
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 24, 2002.
